sql-select.name: GetDatabaseUnusedIndexes
Unused Indexes
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] ,tSI.[name] AS [IndexName] ,tSI.[type_desc] AS [IndexType] ,SUM(tSDDIUS.[user_seeks]) AS [IndexUserSeeks] ,SUM(tSDDIUS.[user_scans]) AS [IndexUserScans] ,SUM(tSDDIUS.[user_lookups]) AS [IndexUserLookups] ,SUM(tSDDIUS.[user_updates]) AS [IndexUserUpdates] FROM [sys].[dm_db_index_usage_stats] tSDDIUS INNER JOIN [sys].[indexes] tSI ON tSI.[object_id] = tSDDIUS.[object_id] AND tSI.[index_id] = tSDDIUS.[index_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[objects] tSO ON tSO.[object_id] = tSDDIUS.[object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] WHERE ObjectProperty(tSDDIUS.[object_id], N'IsMsShipped') = 0 AND ObjectProperty(tSDDIUS.[object_id], N'IsUserTable') = 1 AND tSI.[name] IS NOT NULL AND tSI.[is_primary_key] = 0 AND tSDDIUS.[user_seeks] = 0 AND tSDDIUS.[user_scans] = 0 AND tSDDIUS.[user_lookups] = 0 GROUP BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] ,tSI.[name] ,tSI.[type_desc] ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSI.[name] ;
